A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This StarWars fim made me angry plain and simple. They killed off Snoke. They killed off Luke. Princess Leia suddenly can fly thru space using the force. Rey is a Jedi Master. Yoda is a ...not the all there in the mind. 

Why did every single serious moment in the film have to be capped with a joke or a stale attempt to be humorous? 

Why does every Hero that appears to save the rebels have to be a women?
